item.description:
This time we will be viewing and discussing the DVD shown here.

This will facilitate understanding Keylontic Science info released since year 1,999.

Since this info is contained on 2 DVD's, it may take additional meetings to finish viewing and discussing them.

Contents are described on this link:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/sca.php

                                            *****

This information goes into the timeline of Keylontic Science information released since year 1,999.  This has everything to do with the current condition of our DNA and how to restore it's intended functioning.

This is also relevant to the structure of the cosmos, since our original DNA encryption included receptors of awarness which need to be healed now.  This is necessary to preserve our original organic capabilities for wellness, longevity, and becoming all we were intended to BE!

If you haven't already viewed the U-Tube presentation on the link below, please make every effort to do so before the meeting.  Technical diagrams are presented during the 3 interviews with Ashayana Deane which will make it much easier to understand the DVD to be viewed.

Each of the 3 interviews lasts about 2 hours, so allow sufficient time and take notes.  Bring a list of questions to the Meetup.  There will be a discussion period after the DVD. 

http://www.krystalspiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign at end of first driveway and on front door. No need to knock. Meeting is in downstairs classroom.
item.why: This Meetup is the third Tuesday of every month, from 6-9 PM in the downstairs classroom at ULCS Clinic, Sanbornton NH.
item.name: DNA Regeneration for Conscousness Expansion and Natural Organic Ascension
